plugin.name: Conference Action Button
plugin.description: Adds a Conference button that will launch chanspy in barge mode, so you can have 3 way conferences. The user requires the 'dial' permission for the button to work.
plugin.description-es_ES: Agrega un botón Conferencia para lanzar chanspy en modo barge, de manera de iniciar pseudo conferencias entre tres. El usuario necesita del permiso 'dial' para que la acción se ejecute.
plugin.changelog: *1.0.4* Use configured extension context instead of hardcoded from-internal, so plugin works with any backend and not only FreePBX *1.0.3* Updates for new 2.30 fop2 client *1.0.2* Add barge mode to crash into a coversation *1.0.1* Fix checking permissions for dial or all *1.0.0* Stable release
